description: This file provides functions to retrieve stock symbols based on a specified universe (e.g., NASDAQ or S&P 500), read symbol files, and compute the top movers within a universe based on growth percentage by utilizing external analysis functions. It handles file I/O, path construction, and orchestrates calls to external modules for finance data analysis.

methods.name: List[str] _read_symbol_file(fname: str)
methods.description: Reads a symbol file from the symbols base directory, cleans and deduplicates the symbols.

methods.name: List[str] get_universe_symbols(universe: str)
methods.description: Returns a list of stock symbols based on the specified universe name, supporting NASDAQ and S&P 500.

methods.name: Tuple[List[GrowthResult],List[str]] get_top_movers_universe( universe: str, start_date, end_date, limit: int, price_field: PriceField | None, client: FinanceClient, )
methods.description: Main function that computes the top stock movers within a specified universe over a date range, returning growth results and warnings.

ctags.name: get_top_movers_universe
ctags.signature: ( universe: str, start_date, end_date, limit: int, price_field: PriceField | None, client: FinanceClient, )
